about_the_game:
Welcome to a world of darkness and danger, where survival is key and enemies lurk around every corner. You find yourself stranded in the middle of nowhere after a plane crash, with nothing but predators for company. Crocodiles, bears, and wolves are just a few of the deadly creatures that you must face in each round. Armed with an array of weapons and the ability to scavenge for health packs, ammo, and batteries, you must fight your way through the darkness and uncover the mystery behind two long-dead skeletons.

But beware, for the darkness is your greatest enemy. With limited visibility, you must use your wits and your resources to stay alive. The batteries you collect are essential to lighting up the environment, revealing the horrors that await you in the shadows. This game is not for the faint of heart, as it combines elements of horror with the intense action of a first-person shooter.

With a storyline that unfolds as you progress, you will be on the edge of your seat as you uncover the truth about the mysterious skeletons and the reason behind the deadly predators. This game is the ultimate test of survival, as you fight to stay alive and uncover the truth in a world that wants you dead. Are you ready to take on the challenge? The predators are waiting, and time is running out.

name: Nature is hungry

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: After a plane crash, fight for survival against deadly predators. Gather essential supplies to stay alive and uncover the mystery behind two long-dead skeletons and the crocodiles' presence. In this horror FPS game, the night is your greatest enemy. Can you survive until dawn and solve the mystery?
